SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.mapper

Interface AppraisalMapper

public interface AppraisalMapper
MapStruct mapper interface for converting between AppraisalEntity and its DTO representations.

Features:

  • Automatic mapping between AppraisalEntity, AppraisalDTO, and AppraisalResponseDTO
  • Handles mapping of nested user and cycle objects, including their IDs and response DTOs
  • Supports mapping of collections (lists) of appraisals and DTOs
  • Prevents circular references by using qualified mappings for user fields
  • Ignores sensitive or unnecessary fields as needed for security and clarity
  • Provides update methods for partial entity updates from DTOs

Usage: This interface is implemented automatically by MapStruct at build time. Inject or obtain an instance via CDI or the generated implementation for use in your service layer.

  • Method Details

    • toDto

      AppraisalDTO toDto(AppraisalEntity appraisalEntity)
      Maps an AppraisalEntity to an AppraisalDTO.

      Maps user and cycle relationships to their respective IDs and response DTOs.

      Parameters:
      appraisalEntity - the entity to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped DTO, or null if input is null

    • toResponseDto

      AppraisalResponseDTO toResponseDto(AppraisalEntity appraisalEntity)
      Maps an AppraisalEntity to an AppraisalResponseDTO.

      Includes cycle end date and full user objects for richer API responses.

      Parameters:
      appraisalEntity - the entity to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped response DTO, or null if input is null

    • toEntity

      AppraisalEntity toEntity(AppraisalDTO appraisalDTO)
      Maps an AppraisalDTO to an AppraisalEntity.

      Ignores user and cycle relationships to avoid unintended persistence issues; these should be set explicitly in the service layer.

      Parameters:
      appraisalDTO - the DTO to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped entity, or null if input is null

    • toDtoList

      List<AppraisalDTO> toDtoList(List<AppraisalEntity> appraisals)
      Maps a list of AppraisalEntity objects to a list of AppraisalDTO objects. Returns an empty list if input is null.

    • toEntityList

      List<AppraisalEntity> toEntityList(List<AppraisalDTO> appraisalDTOs)
      Maps a list of AppraisalDTO objects to a list of AppraisalEntity objects. Returns an empty list if input is null.

    • updateEntityFromDto

      void updateEntityFromDto(AppraisalDTO appraisalDTO, AppraisalEntity appraisalEntity)
      Updates an existing AppraisalEntity with values from an AppraisalDTO.

      Useful for partial updates while preserving existing entity relationships and IDs. Ignores user, cycle, and ID fields to avoid accidental changes.

      Parameters:
      appraisalDTO - the DTO containing the new values
      appraisalEntity - the existing entity to update (modified in place)
